definition: abbr. for 榮譽軍人|荣誉军人[rong2 yu4 jun1 ren2]

sentences.english: L'Hotel des Invalides is the first site I visited in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 榮軍院是我第一個正式參觀的巴黎景點。

sentences.english: Some countries observe November 11th as Armistice Day or RemembranceDay.
sentences.chinese: 一些國家把這一天定爲休戰日或榮軍紀念日。
這是一張榮軍院入口的照片。

sentences.english: Some countries observe November 11th as Armistice Day or Remembrance Day.
sentences.chinese: 一些國家把這一天視爲休戰紀念日或榮軍紀念日。

sentences.english: If you don't, you can volunteer with organizations that support military families.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，你可以參與相關組織去關愛榮軍家庭。
